entries.s_fd0eff19: I am a part of Lord Nyax's Clan, actually.
entries.s_eff34704: What else is there to do on this planet?
entries.s_b24dbaa5: Hmm... I'm suspicious. You don't look like someone Lord Nyax would recruit. Fine. If you are a part of the clan, then where is the hideout?
entries.s_abab52df: You're lucky I'm desperate for help. I have some information regarding the Nyax Clan and their whereabouts. I also have information about other activities as well.
entries.s_a7c04702: I actually don't know the location offhand. Let me see. Hmmm--Ahh! There, downloaded into your datapad. It may or may not be exact. I hope you won't get lost.
entries.s_a343f6b2: That's what I thought. I knew you weren't. I should know. I was a part of the clan myself. They don't like the fact that I left just to cash in on their location by providing others with their whereabouts. Say, would you like to know? Free of charge! I also know a little bit about other activities on this planet.
entries.s_94914b83: I'm glad to hear that. You had me scared there for a little bit.
entries.s_8487276: I don't want to hear your life story.
entries.s_62db6450: AHH! Stay away from me! I didn't mean to--oh. You're not a part of Lord Nyax's Clan. What a relief! You scared me there. I am right, aren't I? You're not a spy, are you? ... are you?!
entries.s_5bd24f96: Be careful there. They don't like visitors unless you're an Imperial. Better than being a Nyax follower! Eh. May as well be the same thing. Oh well! The location has been downloaded into your datapad.
entries.s_5933dda: Well, there's the Afarathu Cave and the Imperial Strong hold. What are you interested in?
entries.s_508d181c: Hrmph! Fine! I was going to give you information, but now I'm not going to!
entries.s_4f78edca: Why are you so scared of them?
entries.s_43ff531e: Lies! I knew you weren't a part of the clan. I should know. I was one of them! I left because I didn't agree with what they were doing.
entries.s_302a0829: Okay, you got me. I'm not a part of the Clan.
entries.s_2dc5fa6c: I was one of them. They don't like the fact that I left just to cash in on their location by providing others with their whereabouts. Say, would you like to know? Free of charge! I also know a little bit about other activities on this planet.
entries.s_1abf1335: Uhh.. I'm not going to tell you. You'd probably hurt me if I did. I did some of those things, you know. Why don't you go there yourself and find out. Unless, you'd rather do something else on this planet.
entries.s_15b3396c: It's too hard to explain. Besides, someone else could be listening. I don't want them getting the information for free. I downloaded the information into your datapad.
entries.s_1350775c: I'm not going to tell you the location outloud. Downloading it into your datapad would be much easier. I hope you find the place with ease.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (heraldcorellia1.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
